title: MIER Men's Quick Dry Running Shorts with Zipper Pocket, Elastic Waist Athletic Workout Exercise Fitness Shorts, 7 Inch
description: MIER Men's workout shorts are built for your outdoor and indoor activities. They are made of breathable, soft and 4-way stretch material, features stretch, dry fit and breathable, provide a cool feel in your movements
This Men's exercise shorts have 3 zippered pockets included 2 front zipper pockets and 1 rear zipper pocket to hold your essential item
Men's breathable training shorts are 7" inseam, elastic waistband with built-in drawstring to adjust enhance a personal fit
Simple design with contrasting color zipper, make your classical shorts with a little point to create a new fashion
Mens athletic shorts are suitable for your running, workout, training, sports and daily wear. Machine washable
